article.description: Zac Cuthbertson scored 18 points to lead six scorers into double figures as Coastal Carolina cruised to an easy 91-47 victory over Division III Ferrum in the season opener Tuesday night.
article.headline: Cuthbertson, Coastal Carolina cruise past D-III Ferrum 91-47
article.linkText: Cuthbertson, Coastal Carolina cruise past D-III Ferrum 91-47
article.story: CONWAY, S.C. -- Zac Cuthbertson scored 18 points to lead six scorers into double figures as Coastal Carolina cruised to an easy 91-47 victory over Division III Ferrum in the season opener Tuesday night. The Chanticleers muscled their way to the win, scoring more than half their points inside while shooting 52 percent from the field, knocking down 32 of 61 shots. They also held a commanding advantage on the boards, outrebounding Ferrum 39-24. Cuthbertson hit 7 of 10 shots from the floor, including a pair of powerful dunks, and grabbed seven rebounds before taking a seat with 10 minutes left. David Pierce added 12 points for Coastal Carolina. Tommy Burton added 11 while DeVante Jones, Amidu Bamba and Tyrell Gumbs-Frater each added 10. Trey Barnhardt was 5-for-6 from behind the 3-point line to lead Ferrum with 17 points. Rashad Reed added 14.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
